text: Ahead is a spider web. Regular attacks are useless against it, but with a demon body you can destroy it with fireballs.
Fire against spider webs? Logical. These demonic hands might finally be useful for something other than destruction.
In our line of work, destruction is often creative. Sometimes to clear a path, you need to burn the obstacles first.
Demon philosophy? Alright, testing these hellish abilities in practice!
